verses.name: 2 Chronicles 35:9
verses.text: Conaniah also, and Shemaiah and Nethaneel, his brethren, and Hashabiah and Jeiel and Jozabad, chief of the Levites, gave unto the Levites for passover offerings five thousand small cattle, and five hundred oxen.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 35:10
verses.text: So the service was prepared, and the priests stood in their place, and the Levites in their courses, according to the king’s commandment.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 35:11
verses.text: And they killed the passover, and the priests sprinkled the blood from their hands, and the Levites flayed them.
